issue.title: [Integration] GitHub Actions integration test job does not test against "gold" 0.14.1 files in apache/arrow-testing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9252](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9252). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm not sure when and why this was dropped but it is critical that these tests from 

https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/26d72f328b82bcff4e074109a5f905ebf069a416#diff-776ea3bf11df5829827f7afb43c37174

are restored

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9252?focusedCommentId=17147372) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
As I commented on GitHub, most of these files cannot be read anymore because of the change to represent int64 values as strings. Should be add backward compatibility code to parse the old representation?
